note.p: Death: The Observatory, Birkdale, near Southport (07 October 1887)
Career: Went to sea (1829-1835); assisted his father in his job as a land steward; took up astronomy; Astronomer to the Corporation of the City of Manchester (by 1881)
Memberships: FRAS (1858); Manchester Literary and Philosophical Society
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1887-1888 vol 43 pp iv-vi signed by B S
James Bottomley 'Memoir of the late Joseph Baxendell, FRS, FRAS' in Proceedings of the Manchester Literary and Philosophical Society, 4th deries, Vol. 1, pp 28-58
